verses.verse: <S%G3588><s%> But The <S%G1161><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> Expressly <S%G4490><s%> Speaks, <S%G3004><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Latter <S%G5306><s%> Times <S%G2540><s%> Shall Depart From <S%G868><s%> Some <S%G5100><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Faith, <S%G4102><s%> Giving Heed <S%G4337><s%> To Spirits <S%G4151><s%> Deceiving <S%G4108><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Teachings <S%G1319><s%> Of Demons <S%G1140><s%>
In <S%G1722><s%> Hypocrisy <S%G5272><s%> Of Speakers Of Lies, <S%G5573><s%> Being Cauterized <S%G2743><s%> <S%G3588><s%> As To Their Own <S%G2398><s%> Conscience, <S%G4893><s%>

Forbidding <S%G2967><s%> To Marry, Bidding <S%G1060><s%> To Abstain <S%G567><s%> From Meats, <S%G1033><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Created <S%G2936><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> Reception <S%G3336><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> Thanksgiving <S%G2169><s%> For The <S%G3588><s%> Faithful <S%G4103><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Who Know <S%G1921><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Truth. <S%G225><s%>

Because <S%G3754><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> Creature <S%G2938><s%> Of God Is <S%G2316><s%> Good, <S%G2570><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Nothing <S%G3762><s%> To Be Rejected, <S%G579><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> Thanksgiving <S%G2169><s%> Being Received; <S%G2983><s%>
It Is Sanctified <S%G37><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> By <S%G1223><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%> God's <S%G2316><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Intercourse With Him . <S%G1783><s%>

These Things <S%G5023><s%> Laying Before <S%G5294><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Brethren, <S%G80><s%> Good <S%G2570><s%> Thou Wilt Be <S%G2071><s%> A Servant <S%G1249><s%> Of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> Being Nourished <S%G1789><s%> With The <S%G3588><s%> Words <S%G3056><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Faith, <S%G4102><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Good <S%G2570><s%> Teaching <S%G1319><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Thou Hast Closely Followed. <S%G3877><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But The <S%G1161><s%> Profane <S%G952><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Old Wives ' <S%G1126><s%> Fables <S%G3454><s%> Refuse, <S%G3868><s%> <S%G1128><s%> But Exercise <S%G1161><s%> Thyself <S%G4572><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Piety; <S%G2150><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> <S%G1063><s%> For Bodily <S%G4984><s%> Exercise <S%G1129><s%> For <S%G4314><s%> A Little <S%G3641><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> Profitable, <S%G5624><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1161><s%> But Piety <S%G2150><s%> For <S%G4314><s%> Everything <S%G3956><s%> Profitable <S%G5624><s%> Is, <S%G2076><s%> Promise <S%G1860><s%> Having <S%G2192><s%> Of Life, <S%G2222><s%> Of That Which Is <S%G3588><s%> Now <S%G3568><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Of That Which Is <S%G3588><s%> Coming. <S%G3195><s%>
Faithful Is <S%G4103><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Of All <S%G3956><s%> Acceptation <S%G594><s%> Worthy; <S%G514><s%>

<S%G1519><s%> <S%G5124><s%> For, For This <S%G1063><s%> Both <S%G2532><s%> We Labour <S%G2872><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> , Are Reproached, <S%G3679><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> We Have Hope <S%G1679><s%> In <S%G1909><s%> A God <S%G2316><s%> Living, <S%G2198><s%> Who <S%G3739><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> Preserver <S%G4990><s%> Of All <S%G3956><s%> Men, <S%G444><s%> Specially <S%G3122><s%> Of Believers. <S%G4103><s%>

No One <S%G3367><s%> Thy <S%G4675><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Youth <S%G3503><s%> Let Despise, <S%G2706><s%> But <S%G235><s%> A Pattern <S%G5179><s%> Be <S%G1096><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Believers <S%G4103><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Word, <S%G3056><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Conduct, <S%G391><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Love, <S%G26><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> , Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Faith, <S%G4102><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Purity. <S%G47><s%>
Till <S%G2193><s%> I Come, <S%G2064><s%> Give Heed, <S%G4337><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Reading, <S%G320><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Exhortation, <S%G3874><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Teaching. <S%G1319><s%>

<S%G3361><s%> Be Not Negligent <S%G272><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Thee <S%G4671><s%> Gift, <S%G5486><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Was Given <S%G1325><s%> To Thee <S%G4671><s%> Through <S%G1223><s%> Prophecy <S%G4394><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> Laying On <S%G1936><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Hands <S%G5495><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Elderhood. <S%G4244><s%>

These Things <S%G5023><s%> Meditate On, <S%G3191><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Them <S%G5125><s%> Be, <S%G2468><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Thy <S%G4675><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Advancement <S%G4297><s%> Manifest <S%G5318><s%> May Be <S%G5600><s%> Among <S%G1722><s%> All. <S%G3956><s%>

Give Heed <S%G1907><s%> To Thyself <S%G4572><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Teaching; <S%G1319><s%> Continue <S%G1961><s%> In Them; <S%G846><s%> <S%G5124><s%> For This <S%G1063><s%> Doing, <S%G4160><s%> Both <S%G2532><s%> Thyself <S%G4572><s%> Thou Shalt Save <S%G4982><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Those That <S%G3588><s%> Hear <S%G191><s%> Thee. <S%G4675><s%>
